Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than what the market typically offers. For you, this product is priced at $80, reflecting its true worth and the benefits it will bring to you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-tier solution. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about how this product can be beneficial to you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $80.
